common_errors.cause: Request timed out - cluster unreachable or overloaded
common_errors.solution: Check cluster health: etcdctl endpoint health. Verify network connectivity.

common_errors.cause: etcd server not running or listening on different endpoint
common_errors.solution: Start etcd. Check --endpoints flag. Default: localhost:2379

common_errors.error_pattern: Error: rpc error.*authentication is not enabled
common_errors.cause: Client using auth but server doesn't have auth enabled
common_errors.solution: Remove --user flag, or enable auth: etcdctl auth enable

common_errors.error_pattern: Error: etcdserver: user name is empty
common_errors.cause: Auth required but no username provided

common_errors.solution: Re-authenticate. Token may have expired. Check token-ttl setting.

common_errors.cause: User lacks permission for this key/operation
common_errors.solution: Grant role with access: etcdctl role grant-permission rolename readwrite /prefix/*

common_errors.cause: Trying to add member that's already initialized
common_errors.solution: Remove old data dir to re-join, or use existing member update.

common_errors.error_pattern: Error: etcdserver: mvcc: required revision has been compacted
common_errors.solution: Use more recent revision. Adjust auto-compaction settings if needed.
Reduce request rate. Check quota and limits. Consider increasing quota.
Provide CA cert: --cacert=/path/to/ca.crt. Or use --insecure-skip-tls-verify (not for prod).
